a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball IV

p.k: The Disaster / The Re-Run / The Stories When Rob purchases a universal remote from the Awesome Store he discovers he can control the universe. He rewinds into the past and remembers Gumball had left him in The Void. / When we last saw Gumball he was hitting rewind on Rob's Universal Remote just in time to save himself from being trapped in The Void. / Gumball and Darwin go to extreme lengths to help Molly make her dull stories more interesting.
